scenes.action_text: ARSENIC AND OLD LACE Written by Julius J. & Philip G. Epstein Adapted from the play by Joseph Kesselring CREDITS Credits roll, in white letters, on several funny cartoons, all of them about witches and witchcraft (a caldron over a fire, with two witches on either side of it - A close-up of one of the witches - A witches falling down from the sky on her broomstick, and loosing her hat in the fall - A furious black cat spitting at an owl seated on a bran
